title: CU Anschutz Newsroom
author: Guest Contributor; September
cleaned_text: A research team led by scientists from the Consortium for Fibrosis Research & Translation (CFReT) at the [University of Colorado School of Medicine](https://medschool.cuanschutz.edu) has identified a potential target for treating heart failure related to fibrosis. CU Anschutz Fitzsimons Building
